root_cause: Memory leak in WebSocket connection handler
resolution: Deployed hotfix v2.4.1 with proper connection cleanup logic. Added event listener removal in disconnect handler.
lessons_learned: Implemented heap dump automation and connection count monitoring alerts

root_cause: Redis cache memory exhaustion due to missing TTL configuration
resolution: Applied 24-hour TTL to user session keys. Scaled cache cluster from 4 to 6 nodes. Cleared expired keys.
lessons_learned: Created cache capacity planning dashboard and TTL best practices documentation

root_cause: Database connection pool exhaustion from N+1 query pattern
resolution: Increased connection pool size from 20 to 50. Deployed query optimization patch for ORM configuration.
lessons_learned: Implemented connection pool monitoring and query performance testing in CI/CD pipeline

root_cause: Configuration error in load balancer health check interval
resolution: Corrected health check interval from 2s to 10s. Adjusted unhealthy threshold from 2 to 5 consecutive failures.
lessons_learned: Added configuration validation checks and infrastructure-as-code review process

root_cause: Log rotation cron job failure causing disk space exhaustion
resolution: Fixed cron job permissions. Compressed and archived logs older than 24 hours. Deleted logs older than 7 days.
lessons_learned: Implemented log rotation job monitoring and centralized log aggregation strategy
